Configuration.Name: Sierra ILS Data Import Server Addon
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: Imports ILS data from Sierra's Items API for transactions that are in the specified data import queue.

Setting.name: RequestMonitorQueue
Setting.Description: The queue that the addon will monitor for transactions that need ILS data automatically imported from Sierra. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: SuccessRouteQueue
Setting.Description: The queue that the addon will route requests to after successfully importing ILS data from Sierra. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: ErrorRouteQueue
Setting.Description: The queue that the addon will route requests to if errors are encountered while importing ILS data from Sierra. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: SierraApiUrl
Setting.Description: Base URL for the Sierra API. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: ClientKey
Setting.Description: Client Key used for authorization for the Sierra API. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: ClientSecret
Setting.Description: Client Secret used for authorization for the Sierra API. The value of this setting is required.

Setting.name: UserAgent
Setting.Description: Specifies the User-Agent that is sent to Sierra with API requests. The value of this setting is optional.

Setting.name: BibIdSourceField
Setting.Description: Specifies the transaction field that contains the Sierra record's BibID. This setting will be used along with the VolumeSourceField setting to gather item data from Sierra's item API. The value of this setting is required and must match the name of a column from the Transactions table.

Setting.name: VolumeSourceField
Setting.Description: Specifies the transaction field that contains the Sierra record's Volume. This setting will be used along with the BibIdSourceField setting to gather item data from Sierra's item API. The transaction field specified in this setting may contain additional information that is not related to the item's volume. The value of this setting is required and must match the name of a column from the Transactions table.

Setting.name: CleanUpVolumeSourceField
Setting.Description: Specifies whether or not the Transaction's volume information should be removed from the specified VolumeSourceField. This is to help clean up transaction data in the event that the volume information was scraped from a webpage, where the volume information is conjoined with other data. The value of this setting is required and must be either "true" or "false".

Setting.name: VolumeDestinationField
Setting.Description: Specifies the transaction field where the volume information for the transaction should be stored. The value of this setting is optional. If specified, the value of this setting must match the name of a column from the Transactions table.

Setting.name: BarcodeDestinationField
Setting.Description: Specifies the transaction field where gathered barcode information should be stored. The value of this setting is optional. If specified, the value of this setting must match the name of a column from the Transactions table.

Setting.name: ExactSearch
Setting.Description: Determines whether searching is exact (i.e., looks for an excact string match). If set to false, searching would rather rely on substring matching

Setting.name: CallNumberFieldRegularExpression
Setting.Description: A regular expression for parsing the call number field for volume information. Do not use this feature by setting the value to nothing.
